meanings.definition: People or machines that cast lines.
meanings.sent1: The linecasters at the fishing competition were busy casting their lines into the water.
meanings.sent2: The linecasters in the factory efficiently cast lines for the fishing rods.
meanings.sent3: The linecasters at the circus were so skilled, they could cast lines with their eyes closed!
meanings.sent4: The linecasters in the play were like magical wizards casting lines of light across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The linecasters in the movie made the process of casting lines look like a graceful dance.

meanings.sent1: Watching the linecasters at the dock was fascinating as they skillfully cast their lines into the water.
meanings.sent2: The linecasters in the competition showed great precision in their line casting techniques.
meanings.sent3: The linecasters at the park put on a show, casting lines in sync with music playing in the background.
meanings.sent4: The linecasters in the painting seemed to bring the canvas to life with their colorful lines.
meanings.sent5: The linecasters in the story cast lines of hope and friendship wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A type of equipment used for casting lines.
meanings.sent1: The new linecasters were designed to make line casting easier for beginners.
meanings.sent2: The linecasters in the store varied in size and color to suit different fishing preferences.
meanings.sent3: The linecasters at the event were so advanced, they could cast lines with just a flick of a switch.
meanings.sent4: The linecasters in the game were like powerful tools, casting lines to navigate through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The linecasters in the advertisement promised smooth and accurate line casting for all anglers.
